tool.name: SAGA.table_tools.23
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTABLE False isArrayFIELD False output_data_OUTPUT $output_data_OUTPUT name SAGA.table_tools.23 TABLE $TABLE FIELD $FIELD NAME '$NAME' prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.outputType_OUTPUT transmissionMode_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_OUTPUT

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Table
param.help: Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Field
param.help: Field The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_OUTPUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: With this tool you can change the name of a table's attribute field.
